      • Serialized Fields

          The main application frame that holds this view.

          Service responsible for handling translations in the application.

          JMenu logoutMenu
          Menu for user session-related actions.

          JMenuItem logoutMenuItem
          Menu item to log out the current user.

          JMenuItem newMenuItem
          Menu item to navigate to the new deck view.

          Dimension scaledSize
          The scaled size of the window.
        • scaleFactor
          double scaleFactor
          The scale factor used to adjust UI components based on screen size.

          SpringContext springContext
          Spring context for managing beans and dependencies.
        • translationService
          TranslationService translationService
          Service for managing translations across the application.

          JMenuItem trashMenuItem
          Menu item to navigate to the trash view.

          Button for editing the card.

          Label to display the front content of the card.

    • Class gutek.gui.deck.RevisionSettingsView

      class RevisionSettingsView extends AppView implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • deck
          DeckBase deck
          The deck whose algorithm's hyperparameters are being modified.
        • hiperparameterFields
          Map<String,JTextField> hiperparameterFields
          A map that holds the text fields for each hyperparameter, keyed by their field names.
        • hiperparameterLabels
          Map<String,JLabel> hiperparameterLabels
          A map that holds the labels for each hyperparameter, keyed by their translation keys.
        • menuBarPanel
          DeckMenuPanel menuBarPanel
          The panel containing the deck menu options.
        • saveButton
          JButton saveButton
          Button to save the modified settings.
        • scrollPane
          JScrollPane scrollPane
          Scroll pane to hold the settings panel, allowing scrolling if there are many hyperparameters.
        • settingsPanel
          JPanel settingsPanel
          The panel displaying the hyperparameter settings.
